arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs AEK Larnaca – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: History will be made at Selhurst Park on Thursday as Crystal Palace host their first-ever European group stage home match, welcoming AEK Larnaca in the Conference League. Oliver Glasner’s side began their campaign with a professional win in Poland against Dynamo Kyiv. arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs AEK Larnaca – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: A historic European night beckons at Selhurst Park on Thursday as Crystal Palace play their first-ever group stage home match in a major continental competition. The visit of the Cypriot side AEK Larnaca tonight marks a significant milestone for Crystal Palace. arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs AEK Larnaca: Glasner Sends Message to Devenny and Nketiah
arts.sum: Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner has spoken about Justin Devenny and Eddie Nketiah ahead of the Conference League tie against AEK Larnaca

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs AEK Larnaca predictions: Visitors can keep things tight
arts.sum: Alex Wrigley expects Crystal Palace to beat AEK Larnaca in the UEFA Conference League but they are unlikely to win by a wide margin.
